message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for both parties, as it is worth $15000 to you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase it from me at a special price of $14000. This represents a savings of $1000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I believe this deal will be mutually beneficial and bring great satisfaction to you. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
